storage.name: chest
storage.description: Stores materials and tools! Useful when running out of inventory space

potions.name: haste-1
potions.description: Cooldowns for all commands will decrease by **10%** for 1 hour

potions.name: haste-2
potions.description: Cooldowns for all commands decrease by **25%** for 1 hour

potions.name: haste-3
potions.description: Cooldowns for all commands by **50%** for 1 hour

enchants.name: efficiency-1
enchants.description: Cooldowns for tool specific commands will decrease by **5%**

enchants.name: efficiency-2
enchants.description: Cooldowns for tool specific commands will decrease by **10%**

enchants.name: efficiency-3
enchants.description: Cooldowns for tool specific commands will decrease by **15%**

enchants.name: efficiency-4
enchants.description: Cooldowns for tool specific commands will decrease by **20%**

enchants.name: efficiency-5
enchants.description: Cooldowns for tool specific commands will decrease by **25%**

enchants.name: unbreaking-1
enchants.description: The tool will have a **50%** chance to lose its durability while it is being used

enchants.name: unbreaking-2
enchants.description: The tool will have a **33%** chance to lose its durability while it is being used

enchants.name: unbreaking-3
enchants.description: The tool will have a **25%** chance to lose its durability while it is being used

enchants.name: fortune-1
enchants.description: Increases the chance of **2x** drops by **33%**

enchants.name: fortune-2
enchants.description: Increases the chance of **2x** or **3x** drops by **25%**

enchants.name: fortune-3
enchants.description: Increases the chance of **2x** or **3x** or **4x** drops by **20%**

enchants.name: luck_of_the_sea
enchants.description: Increases the chance of catching fish by **30%** and decreases chance of junk by **30%**
